## ğŸ¯ Project Purpose

**Why This Matters:**
- Get AI-powered analysis of how I'm actually spending my time
- Automatically add time tracking to calendar
- Understand patterns of productive vs. distracted time
- Integrate with existing productivity system (Beeminder, ClickUp, daily check-ins)

**The Vision:**
- Real-time conversation about time usage
- "How did I spend my time today?" gets actual data
- AI can suggest improvements based on actual patterns
- Seamless integration with daily command center workflow

---

## ğŸ”§ Technical Components

### **Rize Integration**
- **What is Rize:** Advanced automatic time tracker
- **Features Used:**
  - Automatic tracking of apps, websites, tasks
  - Focus time detection
  - Productivity scoring
  - Break notifications
  - Overworking alerts
- **API Access:** Need to research Rize API capabilities

### **MCP Server Development**
- **Technology:** MCP (Model Context Protocol)
- **Purpose:** Create bridge between Rize data and AI conversations
- **Capabilities:**
  - Query time tracking data
  - Analyze productivity patterns
  - Add events to calendar based on tracked time
  - Export data for analysis

### **AI Coach Integration**
- **Goal:** Have AI coach access Rize data in real-time
- **Use Cases:**
  - "How much time did I spend on Daybreak today?"
  - "What were my top distractions this week?"
  - "Add my actual work time to my calendar"
  - "Am I working from passion or panic today?"
